transArray.content: The location of the hotel is very good, the breakfast is rich, and it is convenient to travel. It is very close to the subway station and the hospital. The front desk service is very friendly. As soon as you enter the lobby, you see a large pot of oranges, which makes people's eyes light up. It's great!

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The hotel is located in the business district. This location provides guests with great convenience in terms of food, accommodation, travel, entertainment and shopping. Moreover, the hotel's enthusiastic staff will escort you during your trip. We With "the happy mood of the family" as our top priority, we touch everyone with the most considerate warmth. All the staff at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay, thank you!
